column2: "Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses wɔ kokwaa Sinai do dɛ
column4: "Kasa kyerɛ Israelmba
column6: Sɛ hom du asaase a medze rema hom no do a
column7: ɔno asaase no ndzi ahomgye afe mma EWURADZE."

column2: "Mfe esia na dua wo haban mu adze
column3: na mfe esia na pempan wo wenyin ture mu ndua ho
column4: na boaboa no mu nduadzewa ano;"

column2: "Mbom afe a otsia esuon no nyɛ ahomgye pa mu ahomgye afe mfa mma asaase no
column3: nyɛ ahomgye afe mma EWURADZE: mma nndua wo haban mu adze
column4: na mmpempan wo wenyin ture mu ndua ho so."

column2: "Wo ndɔbaa mu dza nankasa efifir no mma nntwa
column3: na wo wenyindua a ennsiesie ho no mma nntsetsew no do esikyireamba: ɔnyɛ ahomgye pa afe mfa mma asaase no."

column2: "Na asaase no n'ahomgye afe no nyɛ edziban mma hom; ɔwo
column3: nye w'akowaa nye w'afonabaa
column4: nye wo paanyi nye wo hɔhoe a ɔabɔsoɛ wo;"

column2: "nye wo fiembowa
column3: nye mbowa a wɔwɔ w'asaase no do
column4: na no do ndɔbaa no nyinara nyɛ hɔn edziban."

column2: "Na kan ahomgye afe mfe esuon ma woho
column3: mfe esuon esuon ahorow esuon; na ɔnyɛ ahomgye afe mfe esuon mu nda mma wo
column4: mekyerɛ mfe eduanan akron."

column2: "Na nkyii bosoom a otsia esuon no ne da a otsia du no ma totorobɛnto ndze kɛse nkɔ aman do; mpata da no mu na hom mma totorobɛnto no nkɔ aman do ntwa mu wɔ hom asaase nyinara do."
"Na hom ntsew afe a otsia eduonum no ho
column3: na wɔmpaa fahodzi wɔ asaase no do mma no do atsefo nyinara: ɔnyɛ ahosɛpɛw afe mma hom; na hom nsan
column4: nyimpa biara nkɔ n'ebusua mu."

column2: "Ahosɛpɛw afe na afe a otsia eduonum no nyɛ mma hom: mma hom nndua
column3: nkyii so wonntwitwa dza nankasa efifir wɔ mu no
column4: na wɔnntsetsew no mu wenyinndua a woennsiesie ho no do esikyireamba so."

column2: "Na ɔyɛ ahosɛpɛw afe; ɔnyɛ krɔnkrɔn mma hom: hom mfi haban no do ndzi do ndzɛmba a ɔba no."
"Ahosɛpɛw afe yi mu no hom nsan
column3: nyimpa biara nkɔ n'egyapadze ho."

column2: "Na sɛ etɔn biribi ma wo nyɛnko
column3: anaa etɔ wɔ wo nyɛnko nsamu a
column4: mma hom mu kor nndzi kor no emim:"

column2: "dɛ mbrɛ ahosɛpɛw afe no ekyir mfe dodow tse no na tɔ wɔ wo nyɛnko hɔ
column3: dɛ mbrɛ ndɔbaa mfe dodow tse no na ɔntɔn mma wo."

column2: "Dɛ mbrɛ mfe no dɔɔ so pa no na to no bo mu
column3: na dɛ mbrɛ mfe no suar pa no na yi no bo do
column4: wɔ ndɔbaa dodow a ɔtɔn ma wo no ho."

column2: "Na mma hom mu kor nndzi kor emim; mbom suro wo Nyankopɔn: na emi nye EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn."
"Dɛm ntsi hom nyɛ m'ahyɛdze
column3: na hom ndzi me mbrasɛm do
column4: na wɔnyɛ; na hom ntsena asaase no do dwudwoodwo."

column2: "Na asaase no bɛma no nsowee
column3: na hom edzi amee
column4: na wɔatsena do dwudwoodwo."

column2: "Na sɛ hom se dɛ
column3: Ebɛnadze na afe a otsia esuon no yebedzi? Hwɛ
column4: yerunndua
column5: na yɛrommboaboa hɛn ndɔbaa ano a:"

column2: "ɔno mebɛhyɛ me nhyira wɔ hom do wɔ afe a otsia awɔtwe no mu
column3: na wondzi nduadzewa no bi
column4: akoradze dadaw no;"

column2: "nkodu afe a otsia akron no
column3: hom ndzi akoradze dadaw araa nkodu dɛ no nduadzewa bɛba."

column2: "Na asaase no mma wɔnntɔn no korakora; osiandɛ asaase no yɛ medze: na hom yɛ ahɔho nye amamforafo wɔ me nkyɛn."
"Na hom enyadze asaase no nyinara do na hom mma asaase no no mponee ho kwan."
"Sɛ ohia wo nua
column3: na ɔtɔn n'egyapadze mu bi a
column4: ɔno no busuanyi a ɔbɛn no no mbra
column5: na ɔmbɔpon dza no nua atɔn no."

column2: "Na sɛ nyimpa bi nnyi obi a ɔpon
column3: na ne nsamu ba adze na onya dza ɔso pon a;"

column2: "ɔno wɔmma ombu no ntɔnee mu mfe dodow ano
column3: na ɔnhyɛ dza ɔbor do no ananmu mma nyimpa no a ɔtɔnee maa no no; na ɔnsan nkɔ n'egyapadze ho."

column2: "Mbom sɛ orunntum nngye bio mma noho a
column3: ɔno dza wɔatɔn no nko nyia ɔatɔ no nsamu nkodu ahosɛpɛw afe no: na ahosɛpɛw afe no mu na omfi hɔ
column4: na ɔnsan nkɔ n'enyadze ho."

column2: "Na sɛ nyimpa bi tɔn ofi a wɔtsena mu wɔ kurow a afadum wɔ ho mu a
column3: ɔno ɔmpon no wɔ no ntɔnee ekyir afrenhyia no mu; na afrenhyia mu na ɔwɔ mponee ho kwan."

column2: "Na sɛ wɔammpon no wɔ afrenhyia mu ntamu a
column3: ɔno fie a ɔwɔ kurow a afadum wɔ ho mu no
column4: ɔnko hɔ daa mma nyia ɔtɔe no korakora
column5: wɔ n'ebusuasantsen mu: ommfi hɔ wɔ ahosɛpɛw afe no mu."

column2: "Na efiefi a ɔwowɔ nkuroba a onnyi fadum a ehyia ho mu dze
column3: wombu nka ɔman no mu haban ho: wɔropon a wɔmpon
column4: na ahosɛpɛw afe no mu omfi hɔ."

column2: "Naaso Levifo nkurow no
column3: hɔn enyadze nkurow mu efi no dze
column4: Levifo no mpon no aber biara."

column2: "Na sɛ Levifo mu kor pon a
column3: ɔno fie no a wɔtɔnee
column4: nye n'enyadze kurow no mfi hɔ wɔ ahosɛpɛw afe no mu: na Levifo nkurow mu efiefi no nye hɔn enyadze wɔ Israelmba mu."

column2: "Na nkurow no no kurotsia haban dze
column3: mma wɔnntɔn
column4: na ɔyɛ hɔn daa enyadze."

column2: "Na sɛ ohia wo nua
column3: na ɔpa abaw wɔ wo nkyɛn a; ɔno suo no mu; na ɔntsena wo nkyɛn dɛ ɔhɔho nye ɔmamforanyi."

column2: "Mma nngye nsiho anaa ndɔree wɔ no hɔ; mbom suro wo Nyankopɔn: ma wo nua nye wo ntsena."
"Mma mmfa wo sika anaa w'edziban mma no nsiho do
column3: wɔ no ndɔree ntsi."

column2: "Emi nye EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn a
column3: miyii hom fii Egypt asaase do
column4: dɛ medze Keenan asaase rema hom

column2: "Na sɛ ohia wo nua wɔ wo nkyɛn
column3: na ɔtɔn noho ma wo a; mma mma ɔnnsom wo dɛ ɔdɔnkɔnyi:"

column2: "na ɔnyɛ wo nkyɛn dɛ mbrɛ ɔpaanyi nye ɔmamforanyi tse; ɔnsom wɔ wo nkyɛn araa ma onkodu ahosɛpɛw afe no mu:"
"na nkyii omfi wo nkyɛn nkɔ
column3: ɔno nye ne mba a wɔwɔ wo nkyɛn
column4: na ɔnsan nkɔ nankasa n'ebusua mu
column5: na n'egyanom enyadze ho na ɔnsan nkɔ."

column2: "Na wɔyɛ mo nkowaa a miyii hɔn fii Egypt asaase do: mma wɔnntɔn hɔn dɛ adɔnkɔfo."
"Mma mmfa egyapadze nnhyɛ no do; mbom suro wo Nyankopɔn."
"Na wo nkowaa nye wo mfonabaa a ibenya no; amanaman a woehyia hom ho no
column3: hɔn mu na hom ntotɔ nkowaa nye mfonabaa."

column2: "Nkyii so ahɔho a wɔabɔsoɛ hom mu hɔn mba no
column3: hɔn hɔ na hom ntɔ
column4: nye hɔn ebusuafo a wɔwɔ hom nkyɛn a wɔawo hɔn wɔ hom asaase do no hɔ: na wɔnyɛ hom egyapadze."

column2: "Na hom nyɛ hɔn egyapadze mma hom mba wɔ hom ekyir
column3: ma woeesuo mu ayɛ egyapadze; na hɔn mu na hom mfa hom adɔnkɔfo daa: hom nuanom Israelmba dze mma hom nnhyɛ hɔn do
column4: mma obiara mmfa egyapadze do nnhyɛ no nua do."

column2: "Na sɛ ɔhɔho anaa ɔmamforanyi bi a ɔwɔ hom nkyɛn nya adze
column3: na ohia wo nua a ɔnye no wɔ hɔ no
column4: na ɔtɔn noho ma ɔhɔho no anaa ɔmamforanyi no a ɔwɔ wo nkyɛn no
column5: anaa ɔhɔho no n'ebusua mu nyimpa bi a:"

column2: "no ntɔnee ekyir no wɔmpon no; na no nuanom mu baako mpon no:"
"anaa no wɔfa
column3: anaa no wɔfa ne babanyin mpon no
column4: anaa n'ebusua mu bɔgya biara a ɔbɛn mpon no; anaa sɛ oenya adze a

column2: "Na ɔnye nyia ɔtɔ no no mbubu mfitsi afe a ɔtɔɔn noho maa no no do nkodu ahosɛpɛw afe no do: na no ntɔnee bo no nyɛ dɛ mbrɛ mfe no no dodow tse."
"Sɛ mfe no da ho dɔɔ so a
column3: ne tsisika mu mponee bo no a ɔbɛdan ama no so ndɔɔ so dɛmara."

column2: "Na sɛ aka mfe kumaabi ma edu ahosɛpɛw afe no do a
column3: ɔno ɔnye no mbubu; dɛ mbrɛ ne mfe no tse no na ɔmfa no mponee sika no ndan mma."

column2: "Ɔnye no ntsena dɛ akowaa a wɔbɔ no paa afrenhyia afrenhyia: mma ɔmmfa egyapadze do nnhyɛ no do wɔ w'enyim."
"Na sɛ woenndua iyinom do ammpon no a
column3: ɔno omfir edzi nkɔ wɔ ahosɛpɛw afe no mu
column4: ɔno nye ne mba nka no ho."

column2: "Osiandɛ Israelmba yɛ nkowaa ma me; wɔyɛ mo nkowaa a miyii hɔn fii Egypt asaase do: emi nye EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn."
